message: I am offering a product for $10000. While it may be tempting to invest in something so expensive, please consider that the probability of receiving a high-quality item is only 33.33%. Given this information, you might want to assess whether $10000 is a fair price for a product with such uncertainty.
Thank you for the information.  Given the uncertainty of quality and the high price, I'm going to pass on this product. I'll keep an eye out for your future offers.

Considering the previous experience, you might be hesitant about purchasing another product at $10000. However, remember that the chance of getting a high-quality item remains the same. This might be an opportunity for you to learn more about my products and perhaps make a decision based on a better understanding of their quality and value.

I appreciate your cautious approach to purchasing.
